text: Ibyo yabategetse mu idini ni nabyo yategetse Nuhu, ndetse n’ibyo twaguhishuriye (yewe Muhamadi), n’ibyo yategetse Ibrahimu, Musa na Issa, avuga ko mugomba gutunganya idini mwirinda kunyuranya naryo. Ababangikanyamana baremererwa n’ibyo mubahamagarira (byo gusenga Imana imwe). Allah yihitiramo uwo ashatse, Uwicuza. akanayobora inzira ye
